title: Yellow floating box with Riot's Logo in game.
body: Towards the end of my game I saw a yellow floating box near spawn and it was just floating there with the Riot Logo in it. I went over it for the second I was able to before almost dying (Enemy was in our base) and nothing happened. I'm just trying to know what that was about. I looked it up, can't seem to find any pictures or information on it. This has been the third game I've played in almost a year so I'm not 100% sure what all changes happened.

replies.body: Did you have an arcade corki on your team? Sounds like his package spawned.
That might be it. I know there was a corki. Thanks for the info :D
Huh.....honestly I'm not sure what that might have been. Could you grab a screenshot of the replay possibly?
That picture  is when that happened to me
